summary: Fort at the edge of Rift hold
descriptionHtml:
The mod adds imperial fort style player house to the border of Rift and Eastmarch, west to Shor's Stone.

Obtaining the house
========
To start the quest, go to Dragonreach and read a letter on the table near Farengar's bed. After that, talk to Farengar to progress.
You will need 15000 gold to buy the house.

House location
========
Bjornheim is located on the border of Rift and Eastmarch, west from Shor's Stone. Look for an open map marker called "Rocky corner" and be ready to face bandits.

Features
========
1. Outer tower with crafting stations
2. Main building, including dining and hearthfire chambers, mannequin rooms, kitchen, library and bedroom
3. Dungeon with prison cells, cave, laboratory and pass to the nearby mine
4. Dwemer elevators
5. Cute domesticated skeever
6. Previous owner's diaries
7. Short additional sidequest
8. Such a fort will surely attract some easy-loot hunters! Lock all doors when leaving it!

Requirements
==========
Skyrim, DLC Dragonborn

Installation
=================
Put the Data folder contents into Skyrim/Data directory. overwhrite if asked. Activate BjornheimEng.esp in the launcher or any similar program

Uninstallation
===================
Deactivate the plugin in the launcher menu. Remove the bsa archive and plugin file from Skyrim/Data

Incompatibility
===========
Any structural or lanscape changes of the surounding location

Known bugs - IMPORTANT

1. If the quest fails to create a topic for Farengar, save and load after you read the letter. Next time the topic must appear.
2. If you got invisible exterior, go inside the fort, save there and then load. To evade this bug you should use fast travel marker when returning to Bjornheim.
author: Horinf
